Prayers Go Out To Bud Sharon Miller Genevieve Lohmuller Becky Biberstein Fern Britton James Yonker Sr Evelyn Morrissey Betty Meyer Ron Payne David Carr Ronnie Bonnie Burns Michael Green Dorothy Dottie Marbach Rick Cotterman Frances Carr Kelsey Peters Tom Richhart Carol Lochtefeld and Priscilla Rhodes MOST HOLY TRINITY SUNDAAY MAY 27 2018 YR 8TH SUNDAY IN ORDINARY TIME YR THE MYSTERY OF THE TRIUM GOD CANNOT BE FULLY COMPREHENDED Still We are invited to the Ineffable Mystery of the Triune God Remember that next Sunday is the Solemnity of the Body and Blood of Christ As such there will be Eucharistic Procession from 8 30 am to 9:15am everybody is invited to participate My dear brothers and sisters in Christ in the name of the Lord Jesus I say the Lord with you all Today we celebrate The Ineffable Mystery of the Triune God For every Christian Catholic the most first probable thing we were taught by our parents about our Religion is the Trinity It is taught by teaching us to make the sign of the Cross In the name of the Father and of the Son and of the Holy Spirit Amen It is the expression of the belief in the Triune God the three Per sons in One God The Trinitarian doctrine is the most wonderful mystery we have in our religion It is the revelation of God as Father Son and Holy Spirit It tells us what God is for us But about the mysterious unity of the THREE Father Son and Holy Spirit we can not adequately and fully express it God cannot be completely comprehended by hu man concepts It is more important to relate with God than to seek to fully knowing Him An intimate persontoperson relationship with God gives us knowledge of God that cannot possibly be expressed in human word and terminology It is that kind of knowledge of God that satisfies a human being Oh how wonderful is the depth of the riches and wisdom and knowledge of God how unsearchable are his ways God is One and God is Three In the 1st reading Dt 43234 3940 Moses expressed how the Hebrews experienced God It was through Gods inspiration that the Jews experienced God as One God In spired by God Moses said This is why you must now know and fix in your heart that the Lord is God in the heavens above and on earth below and that there is no other So there is only One God St Paul in the 2nd Reading Rom 81417 Admonished that if we want to experi ence God we must be totally involved As good children in a family are involved in the matters of the family so must we be involved in the family of God being coheirs with the Lord Jesus And from the Gospel Mt 281620 The Evangelist Matthew We learnt from the Bible that discipleship does not just mean following and learning from the master Yes follow learn but and must establish a strong persontoperson relationship It involves faith trust in the teacher So we need to have faith and trust in the Father in the Son and in the Holy Spirit All three Persons are One the Triune God the Holy Trinity The story and the experience of St Augustine expressed it so well that we should not disturb ourselves trying to comprehend the meaning of the Trinity We need just to believe trust and methodically and humbly study the trinity and left ourselves in the hands of God to teach us and in love relate to Him We need to pray and experience God You know the story I told you that some time age If you do not remember ask somebody or ask me NB 1 Remember that we shall have Eucharistic Procession on June 3rd the So lemnity of the Precious Body and Blood of Christ after the 7:30am Mass Please make some effort to join in the Eucharistic procession It is a way of professing our faith and expressing our love to the Jesus Christ in the Holy Eucharist 2 As I told you last Sunday the Liturgical Ordinary Time of the year resumes Week day readings are taken form cycle for Year 11 and Sunday readings are taken from Year ASIGNMENT Take home question Have you ever experienced God How when where God bless you Rev Msgr Pius Ilechukwu NB Heaven is for us all I hope you are doing something about it The amount needed each week to make budget is 511640 We are 221700 behind budget from last week Other Collections within our Parish Mothers MAYJUNE 2018 Sun June 3 Eucharistic Procession 830905 Let us show our Faith and express our belief in the real Presence of Our Lord in the Eucharist Mon June 4 through Fri June 8 Msgr Pius will be gone attend ing the Annual Priests Retreat No weekday Masses the usual Mass schedule will begin Sat June 9th Tues June 5 Knights of Columbus meeting Rosary at 640 in Church meeting at 7:00pm in the social hall Thurs June 7 There will not be All Day Adoration on this day as Msgr Pius will be away on Priests Annual Retreat Sun June 10 Graduation Mass at 10:00am followed by brunch for the graduates and their families in the social hall Sun June 10 Red Cross Blood Drive hosted by the Knights of Columbus in the gym watch for details and a sign up sheet Sun June 10 Graduation Mass at 10:00am followed by brunch for the graduates and their families in the social hall Tues June 12 to Mon June 25 Michelle will be out of the office on vacation Sun June 17 Fathers Day Coffee Donuts after 730 1000 Masses served by St Joseph Womens Group Fri June 22St Joseph night at the TinCaps Game Its also SU PER HERO night come dressed as your favorite Super Hero game begins at 7:05pm followed by Fireworks after the game Sign up sheet in the narthex if you plan to attend so tickets may be ordered together ST JOSEPH NIGHT AT THE BALL PARK Friday June 22 at 7:05pm SUPERHERO NIGHT Come dressed as your favorite SUPERHERO and stay for the postgame fireworks We have 50 seats reserved in Section 113 on the 3rd baseline Tickets are 10 each Signup sheet in the narthex or call the Parish Office at Marcellinus and Peter Martyrs Jude 17 20b25 Mk 112733 Sun June 3 The Most Holy Body and Blood of Christ Corpus Christi Ex 2438 Heb 91115 Mk (141)216-2226 REV UP YOUR MARRIAGE The St Josephs Marriage Encounter Weekend has been rescheduled for August 2526 2018 If you are married and want a weekend to grow as a cou ple then Marriage Encounter is for you This weekend will be held right here at St Josephs where you can attend during the day and return to your home for overnight Registration is online at www.wwmeni.org and brochures with registra tion forms are available in the back of church You may return registrations in the collection basket in an envelope marked Marriage Encounter or by mail Contact George and Dianne Witwer with questions or to register by email or phone dhwit wergmail.com or 8244503 Sign up early We are requesting reg istrations be completed by June 30 for planning purposes PENTECOST COLLECTION FOR THE EDUCATION OF SEMINARIANS Thank you To all who have
